<h2><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>On

was approved unanimously by each of t</span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>he ISCB Executive Committee, the
ISCB Board of Directors, and the ISCB Public Affairs Committee. </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt'>At the time, I was the Chair of the ISCB Public
Affairs Committee and a member of the ISCB Board of Directors; <span
class=SpellE>Burkhard</span> <span class=SpellE>Rost</span> was President of
the ISCB. The statement was simultaneously co-published by the two official
journals of the ISCB, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Bioinformatics</i>
and <span class=SpellE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>PLoS</i></span><i
